text: La Wally is an Italian opera in four acts by Alfredo Catalani. It was first performed in Milan on March 28, 1896. The libretto was written by Luigi Illica. La Wally was a great success. ==Principal roles== * Wally - soprano * Giuseppe Hagenbach - tenor * Vincenzo Gellner - baritone * Stromminger - bass ==Reference== * The Complete Dictionary of Opera & Operetta, James Anderson, Wings Books, 1993. Category:1890s operas
title: La Wally
